languages.text: Лучащийся счастьем старец примкнул к корабельным блюстителям, чтобы научить молодых воинов стойкости и несокрушимой преданности.
The beaming old man has joined the ship's enforcers in order to teach younger soldiers lessons in fortitude and unshakeable loyalty.
languages.original_text: Лучащийся счастьем старец примкнул к корабельным блюстителям, чтобы научить молодых воинов стойкости и несокрушимой преданности.

traits.locale_text: The beaming old man has joined the ship's enforcers in order to teach younger soldiers lessons in fortitude and unshakable loyalty.

The beaming old man has joined the ship's enforcers in order to teach younger soldiers lessons in fortitude and unshakeable loyalty.

languages.text: El anciano se ha unido exultante a los guardias de la nave para enseñar a los jóvenes soldados lecciones sobre la resistencia y la lealtad inquebrantable.
languages.original_text: The beaming old man has joined the ship's enforcers in order to teach younger soldiers lessons in fortitude and unshakeable loyalty.

traits.locale_text: El anciano se ha unido exultante a los guardias de la nave para enseñar a los jóvenes soldados lecciones sobre la resistencia y la lealtad inquebrantable.

languages.text: 晴れやかな顔の老人は船のエンフォーサーの仲間入りをして、若い兵士たちに不屈の精神と揺るぎない忠誠心を教えている。
languages.original_text: The beaming old man has joined the ship's enforcers in order to teach younger soldiers lessons in fortitude and unshakeable loyalty.

traits.locale_text: 晴れやかな顔の老人は船のエンフォーサーの仲間入りをして、若い兵士たちに不屈の精神と揺るぎない忠誠心を教えている。

languages.text: 容光焕发的老人加入了执法者的队伍，教导年轻的士兵们何为不可动摇的坚韧与忠诚。
languages.original_text: The beaming old man has joined the ship's enforcers in order to teach younger soldiers lessons in fortitude and unshakeable loyalty.

traits.locale_text: 容光焕发的老人加入了执法者的队伍，教导年轻的士兵们何为不可动摇的坚韧与忠诚。

languages.text: Der strahlende alte Mann hat sich den Enforcers des Schiffs angeschlossen, um jüngere Soldaten Tapferkeit und unerschütterliche Loyalität zu lehren.
languages.original_text: The beaming old man has joined the ship's enforcers in order to teach younger soldiers lessons in fortitude and unshakeable loyalty.

traits.locale_text: Der strahlende alte Mann hat sich den Enforcers des Schiffs angeschlossen, um jüngere Soldaten Tapferkeit und unerschütterliche Loyalität zu lehren.

languages.text: Le vieil homme s'est joint aux prévôts du vaisseau pour servir d'exemple aux jeunes recrues et leur donner des leçons de courage et de loyauté. Rien n'aurait pu lui faire plus plaisir.
languages.original_text: The beaming old man has joined the ship's enforcers in order to teach younger soldiers lessons in fortitude and unshakeable loyalty.

traits.locale_text: Le vieil homme s'est joint aux prévôts du vaisseau pour servir d'exemple aux jeunes recrues et leur donner des leçons de courage et de loyauté. Rien n'aurait pu lui faire plus plaisir.

languages.text: Yüzü mutlulukla parlayan ihtiyar adam, genç askerlere cesaret ve sarsılmaz sadakat dersleri vermek için geminin infazcılarına katıldı.
languages.original_text: The beaming old man has joined the ship's enforcers in order to teach younger soldiers lessons in fortitude and unshakeable loyalty.
